title: East Community Associates Program: Study Series
hero_caption: John Singer Sargent. The Fountain, Villa Torlonia, Frascati, Italy, 1907. Friends of American Art Collection.
short_description: East Community Associates offers five events with a variety of led by fellow Community Associates members
list_description: East Community Associates offers five events with a variety of led by fellow Community Associates members
description:
Join East Community Associates and hear seasonal presentations led by fellow Community Associates member about various art-related topics.

Location: Merrillville Branch of Lake County Public Library at 1919 W. 81st Ave. (Rte. 30), Merrillville, IN, 46410

Program Capacity: 150

Registration period: Thursday, September 20, 2018 – Tuesday, October 9, 2018

Study Series Schedule:
Thursday, October 18
The Joyful Art of Alexander Calder by Susan Childress

Tuesday, February 12
Pre-Raphaelite Brotherhood, Secret Society by Sandy Bushong

Wednesday, March 20
Flowers in Art by Mary Brown

Monday, May 6
Leonardo da Vinci—The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly by Marcia Carson and Jacky Surma

Tuesday, June 11
Post-Impressionists in Provence and Roman Empire Outside of Italy by Ruth and Lou Foster

Schedule of the Day:

10:00 Coffee and light snacks

10:15 Presentation

To reach the event planner, please contact Mary Jo Gorman at (219) 845-1334.

To reach the assistant event planner, please contact Susan Childress at (219) 464-1183 or Mary Ranta at (219) 741-6595.

This Community Associates event is exclusively for current Community Associates members. Membership will be verified at the door, and refunds cannot be issued for those without a valid membership. For Community Associates events that allow guests, nonmember guests must be registered by a Community Associates member.

If you are interested in becoming a member of Community Associates, please visit artic.edu/joinnow to join both the Art Institute of Chicago and the Community Associates group of your choice.
location: Merrillville Branch of Lake County Public Library at 1919 W. 81st Ave. (Rte. 30), Merrillville, IN, 46410
buy_button_caption: $15 per person for a series of 5 events, open to Community Associates members
